name: WAYPAVER FOUNDATION
sampleDescriptions:
Adding enabling space settlement to the charter of various federal agencies engaged in civil space activity
Creating programs that enable space settlement

We are currently trying to get enabling space settlement added to NASA's charter, the Office of Space Commerce Charter, and the Office of commercial space transportation's charter.  S.584 does this fo
